thread.section_title: Foodler Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Foodler | foodler.com
thread.title: Janitza Velazquez

author: Janitza Velazquez
title: Janitza Velazquez
text:
I love the fact that every time you order you get rewarded with points. It's so much better than other ordering sites where you get a chance to play a card, and "maybe" get a reward.
Customer service is fast, attentive, and super nice. Only had 1 issue with a restaurant, but it was resolved as best as it could've been.
I hope more restaurants will get on the band wagon. It will definitely help reach out to more customers.
I can't wait to see what they're going to next.
